summary: The diff implements the vast majority of the requested requirements. All 10 REQs have corresponding implementations. However, a few specific acceptance criteria have gaps: the navigation bar is missing 'About Us' as a top-level menu item, Form 15G/15H links are absent from the Forms dropdown, and the required images (Ashoka emblem, header banner, flag strip) are not referenced in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Navigation bar must include 'About Us' as a top-level dropdown item matching incometax.gov.in structure
missing_requirements.reason: The NAV_ITEMS array in PortalLayout.tsx does not include an 'About Us' menu item. The spec explicitly requires it alongside Home, e-Filing, Tax Services, Forms, Downloads, Help & FAQ.

missing_requirements.requirement: Forms dropdown must include ITR-1 through ITR-7 and Form 15G/15H links as individual dropdown items
missing_requirements.reason: The Forms dropdown in NAV_ITEMS only contains 'ITR Forms' (internal link) and 'All Forms & Downloads' (external). Individual ITR form links and Form 15G/15H entries are not present as dropdown items.

missing_requirements.requirement: Required image assets: Ashoka Chakra emblem (ashoka-emblem.dim_128x128.png), ITD header banner (itd-header-banner.dim_1200x80.png), and Indian flag strip (flag-strip.dim_800x24.png)
missing_requirements.reason: No image files are added in the diff. The build request explicitly requires these three image assets to be present.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ashoka emblem image should appear in the header using the provided asset file
missing_requirements.reason: The header in PortalLayout.tsx does not reference the ashoka-emblem image asset file. Since no image assets were added, the emblem cannot be rendered as specified.

hallucinated_features.description: Additional PAN services beyond the specified six were added: 'PAN Status Check', 'Instant e-PAN', and 'TAN Status Check' cards
hallucinated_features.reason: The spec lists exactly six PAN/TAN services: Apply for New PAN, Apply for Changes/Correction in PAN, Link PAN with Aadhaar, PAN Verification, Apply for TAN, TAN Verification. The diff adds extra services not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: PortalNavigation.tsx stub file created as an empty export with no functionality
hallucinated_features.reason: A file frontend/src/components/PortalNavigation.tsx was added containing only an empty export with a comment. This file was not requested and serves no functional purpose.
